n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>APP_CORE</SCHEMA> <NAME>USER_BOOKING_SUGGESTIONS_PRED</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_UP_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_DATE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_CL_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_CW_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_PARKING_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVCHARGING_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_BIKERACK_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_LOCKER_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_TRAVEL_MEANS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_TRAVEL_TIME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_WEATHER</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_WEATHER_ICON</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_TEMP</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_VIRTUAL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_ONSITE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_OFFISTE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_PERSONAL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_INVITE_BY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_ACCEPT_STATUS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_NUMBER_OF_FRIENDS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_AVAIL_WP</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_UBT_ID_SELECTED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_ACCEPTED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PREDICTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PRED_PROBABILITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select ubs."UBS_ID",ubs."UBS_UP_ID",ubs."UBS_DATE",ubs."UBS_CL_ID",ubs."UBS_CW_ID",ubs."UBS_PARKING_AVAIL",ubs."UBS_EVCHARGING_AVAIL",ubs."UBS_BIKERACK_AVAIL",ubs."UBS_LOCKER_AVAIL",ubs."UBS_TRAVEL_MEANS",ubs."UBS_TRAVEL_TIME",ubs."UBS_WEATHER",ubs."UBS_WEATHER_ICON",ubs."UBS_TEMP",ubs."UBS_EVENTS_VIRTUAL",ubs."UBS_EVENTS_ONSITE",ubs."UBS_EVENTS_OFFISTE",ubs."UBS_EVENTS_PERSONAL",ubs."UBS_INVITE_BY",ubs."UBS_ACCEPT_STATUS",ubs."UBS_NUMBER_OF_FRIENDS",ubs."UBS_AVAIL_WP",ubs."UBS_UBT_ID_SELECTED",ubs."UBS_ACCEPTED", pred.prediction, round(pred_probability*100,2) pred_probability from user_booking_suggestions ubs left join mluser1.USER_BOOKING_PREDICTION pred on ubs.ubs_id = pred.ubs_id </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
